acid.name: Acid
acid.description: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

acid_armor.name: Acid Armor
acid_armor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

aurora_beam.name: Aurora Beam
aurora_beam.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

body_slam.name: Body Slam
body_slam.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bone_club.name: Bone Club
bone_club.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

bubble_beam.name: Bubble Beam
bubble_beam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

comet_punch.name: Comet Punch
comet_punch.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

confuse_ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse_ray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical hit with double the damage.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

cut.name: Cut
cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

defense_curl.name: Defense Curl
defense_curl.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

dizzy_punch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzy_punch.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

double_kick.name: Double Kick
double_kick.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

double_slap.name: Double Slap
double_slap.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

double_team.name: Double Team
double_team.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

double_edge.name: Double-Edge
double_edge.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

dragon_rage.name: Dragon Rage
dragon_rage.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

dream_eater.name: Dream Eater
dream_eater.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

drill_peck.name: Drill Peck
drill_peck.description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

egg_bomb.name: Egg Bomb
egg_bomb.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
